Header: Petitionin Sivaloganathan Vidya murder case fixed for May 19th
Content: An appeals petition filed by seven death row inmates over the rape and murder ofÂ schoolgirl Sivaloganathan Vithiya in Jaffna was fixed for May 19th by the Supreme Court. The order was issued when the case was taken up before a three-member judge bench today. The Jaffna High Court sentenced the appellants to death over charges of abduction, rape, and murder of 18-year old Sivaloganathan Vithiya on May 13th, 2015. Accordingly, they had appealed to the Supreme Court seeking to reduce their punishment. The petition is to be heard before a five-member judge bench starting from the next hearing.
